title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 329-2.1 - Scope and Effective Date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 329-2.1 - Scope and Effective Date

State Regulations
(a) Except as set forth in subdivision (b) herein, payment for ambulatory surgery
services shall be made according to the ambulatory patient group s (APG)
methodology, governing reimbursement for licensed freestanding ambulatory
surgical centers and hospital-based ambulatory surgery services as set forth
herein and subject to WCB specific adjustments. The effective date of this

Subpart shall be October 1, 2015. (b) The following services performed at
licensed freestanding ambulatory surgical centers and hospital-based ambulatory
surgery services on or after March 15, 2021 shall not be subject to APG
methodology, but shall be reimbursed at the following rates: CPT
